pr_title: HIVE-23851: MSCK REPAIR Command With Partition Filtering Fails While Dropping Partitions

timeline.bodyText:
I don't know - have you explored using the SA approach ? seeing the ql class thru reflection looks a bit wierd.
other way around could be to move Expr related classes out from ql (not sure if that's possible)
timeline.author: kgyrtkirk

replies.author: shameersss1

replies.bodyText: or another approach could be when we fail to deserizalize the expr bytes with kyro on exception simply try converting byte array to string
replies.author: shameersss1

replies.bodyText: @kgyrtkirk Any thoughts on above two approaches?
replies.author: shameersss1

replies.bodyText: I have changed the approach, Please take a look at the new implementation.
replies.author: shameersss1
